column2: Umupasitori aregwa gusambanya umukenyezi ku nguvu muri Nigeria yatanze imihoho mu mabanga yo kurongora ishengero.
column3: Uyo mupastori asayangana , Biodun Fatoyinbo yari amaze imisi avugwa mu makuru iyi misi itatu iheze, inyuma yaho umukenyezi azwi cane mu gufata amafoto amwagiririje ko yamusambanije ku nguvu incuro zibiri imbere y'uko ashikana imyaka cumi n'umunani, haheze imyaka irenga cumi. Uyo mu pastori w'ishengero bita COZA rikundwa cane mu gisagara Abuja yanditse ku rubuga ngurukana bumenyi rwa Instagram kuri uyu musi wa mbere  ko yatanze imihoho mu mabanga yiwe kubera iyo nkuru yavuzwe cane. Hari abari bakoze  imyiyerekano mu mpera z'iyindwi mu bisagara bikuru bibiri vy'igihugu ca Nigeria arivyo Lagos na  Abuja. Basabira  ubutungane Busola Dakolo inyuma yaho amasanamu y'uwo mukenyezi  akwiragirijwe cane  ku mbuga  ngurukana bumenyi , avuga ko uyo mupastori yamusambanije ku nguvu. Uyo mu pastori wewe arabihakana. Igipolisi camenyesheje ko kitaramenya ibirego umukenyezi Dakolo yagirije uyo mu pastori  kandi ko ata muntu n'umwe arashikana ibirego nk'ivyo imbere y'ababijejwe. Igihugu ca Nigeria gifise abapastori benshi b'amasengero yemera Kristu y'abapentekoti, bamwe mu bapastori bakunze kwagirizwa kugira  inyifato itabereye.

column2: Ubutunzi bwa Ethiopia burabangamiwe n'intambara ya Tigray
column3: Intambara y'imbere muri Ethiopia imaze amezi 10, imaze guhitana abantu ibihumbi n'ibihumbi, abaharurwa muri za miriyoni barata izabo abandi na bo bari mu kaga  aho bakeneye imfashanyo. Ariko ivyo si vyo vyonyene imaze kwonona ku gihugu kiza ubugira kabiri mu kubamwo abantu benshi muri Afrika - intambara imaze kwonona vyinshi no mu butunzi, bishobora gufata imyaka n'iyindi kugira bisanurwe. Ku mugwa mukuru Addis - Ababa, Tigist w'imyaka 26, atashimye ko amazina yiwe yose akoreshwa, avuga ko amafaranga akoresha ku kwezi ku kwezi ubu yigwije na kabiri kubera imvo zibiri: intambara yadutse muri Tigray mu kwezi kwa cumi  na rimwe hamwe n'ikiza ca coronavirus. Avuga ati: "Imbere y'intambara na Covid, nakoresha birr 1.000 (nk'ama dorari 22) buri kwezi mu gusuma ivyo guteka. Ubu nkoresha birr 2.000". "Ubu ibintu birazimvye gusumba, terefone, impuzu, ivyo kurya." Ibiharuro vyo kugereranya bitangwa n'inzego za reta vyerekana ko ibiciro vy'ivyankenerwa koko vyaduze  muri Ethiopia - muri rusangi mu kwezi kw'indwi vyari  ica kane hejuru y'uko vyari bimeze nk'ico gihe nyene mu mwaka uheze. Tigist akora mw'isoko-duka (supermarket) kugira ashobore gufasha umuryango. Wewe ajejwe gusuma ivyo kurya, musazawe nawe akariha inzu. Avuga kandi ko ''kuvunja idorari na vyo bitameze neza. Mu mwaka uheze, kw'idorari rimwe ($1)  waronka birr 35, ubu uronka 45." Faisal Roble, umuhinga  ari muri Amerika yihweza ibintu n'ibindi na cane cane ivyo mu karere k'ihembe rya Afrika, avuga ko gukoresha amafaranga mu bikorwa vy'intambara bigira "ingaruka mbi ku bushobozi bwa Ethiopia bwo gushikira ama dorari ''  bigatuma kandi urugero rwo kuvunja rutituka. Ntibizwi amafaranga yose intambara imaze gutwara uko angana ariko ikigo citwa Trading Economics kigereranya ko amafaranga aja mu vya gisirikare azoshika kuri miriyoni 502 z'ama dorari gushika mu mpera z'uyu mwaka, mu gihe zari miriyoni  460 mu mwaka uheze. Mu   ndwi iheze umunyamabanga mukuru wa ONU Antonio Guterres yavuze ko iyo ntanbara imaze gutwara igihugu umuriyaridi w'ama dorari. Imbere y'intambara n'ikiza ca coronavirus, ubutunzi bwa Ethiopia bwari mu bunyaruka kwiyongera cane mu karere, bwaduga muri rusangi ku rugero rwa 10% ku mwaka mu myaka 10 yo gushika mu 2019, nk'uko bigereranywa na banki y'isi (Banque Mondiale). Mu gihe Tigist avuga urugero rwo kuvunja muri banki, Roble avuga ko birr (ifaranga rya Ethiopia) kw'isoko isanzwe ho ryakorotse gusumba, ubu idorari rimwe rikaba rivunjwa birr  67. Avuga ko abagwizatunga muri ico gihugu ubu imitsi yama yaranze kubera ikibazo c'umutekano mu gihe intambara ubu yarenze imbibe za Tigray ikaba igeze mu ntara bihana imbibe za Afar na Amhara. Intambara yatanguye igihe umugambwe wahora utwara intara ya Tigray, Tigray  People's Liberation Front (TPLF) watera amakambi ya gisirikare mu kwezi kwa 11, biturutse ku kutumvikana ku bibazo vya poritike n'umushikiranganji wa mbere, Abiy Ahmed. Kuva ico gihe, ingabo za Ethiopia - hamwe n'ingabo za Eritrea zibashigikiye, bafatanije n'igipolisi n'utundi tugwi tugendana ibigwanisho, baciye batangura intambara imaze gusesa amaraso menshi, yo kugwanya TPLF. Impande zompi zimaze kwagirizwa gukora amahano, harimwo gusambanya ku nguvu no kwica  ikivunga abanyagihugu basanzwe. Intara ya Tigray nta vyankenerwa ikironka, harimwo uburyo bwo gutumatumanako hamwe na banki, kuva reta ya Ethiopia ifashe ingingo yo kwugarana iyo ntara mu kwezi kwa gatandatu, inyuma y'aho abagwanyi ba Tigray bigaruriye umugwa mukuru Mekelle. Abantu 400.000 muri Tigray ubu babayeho nk'abugarijwe n'inzara mu gihe  kubashikiriza imfashanyo bigorana cane, umuyagankuba n'ibitoro na vyo bikaba biboneka nabi nabi bigatuma ibiciro biduga. Filmon Berhane aba muri Mekelle yabwiye BBC mu rurimi rw'igi-Tigrinya ko ibiciro vy'ivyo kurya n'amazu muri iyi minsi vyaduze cane. Yavuze ati: "Nta mafaranga ahari  kuko amabanki yose arugaye, muri reta na ho ntibagitanga imishashara". Mu makungu, iyo ntambara yagize ingaruka kw'izina rya Ethiopia nk'igihugu co kujanamwo imitahe nk'uko bivugwa na Irgard Erasamus wo mu kigo ca NKC African Economics. Madame  Erasmus afatira akarorero nko ku gisata c'amaterefone co muri Ethiopia caheruka gushirwa kw'isoko y'abikorera ku giti cabo, aho cari cakweze abanyamitahe benshi barimwo abo muri Afrika y'Epfo nk'igihangange MTN. Ariko amaherezo kompanyi imwe gusa ni yo yahavuye ihiganirwa rumwe mu mpusha zibiri zari zashizwe kw'isoko, n'urufatanye rw'amakompanyi rurongowe na Safaricom yo muri Kenya ku mafaranga angana na miriyoni 850 y'amadorari. Abahinga bavuga ko intambara ya Tigray yatumye abanyamitahe bacika intege. Ukwiyongera kw'ubutunzi bwa Ethiopia muri rusangi uyu mwaka kugereranywa ko kuzogabanuka cane kuva kuri 6% mu 2020 gushika ku 2% mu 2021 - urugero rwa mbere rwo hasi mu myaka hafi 20, ku bw'ikigega mpuzamakungu FMI. Igihugu kigurira hanze ibintu biciye miriyaridi 14 z'amadorari ku mwaka, mu gihe kigurisha ibiciye  imiriyaridi 3,4 z'ama dorari. Hari n'amakenga ku kwiyongera kw'ideni rya reta ya Ethiopia mu gihugu hagati, aho hari abagereranya ko rizoshika ku miriyaridi 60 z'ama dorari uyu mwaka, hafi y'ibice 70% y'umwimbu rusangi wo muri ico gihugu. Mu gihe Amerika yafatiye ingingo zimwe zimwe zerekeye impusha zo kuja muri ico gihugu abanye Ethiopia bafise uruhara muri iyo ntambara, kandi ikanahagarika zimwe zimwe mu mfashanyo yaha Ethiopia, gushika ubu amakungu yirinze kuremera cane reta ku bijanye n'ubutunzi, canke ngo ahagarike imigambi y'imfashanyo y'ubutunzi,  hafi ica kane c'abanyagihugu babayeho musi y'urugero rw'ubukene, na yo muri rusangi umwimbu w'umunyagihugu ungana n'amadorari 850 ku mwaka.

column2: Jeanne Gapiya - Covid niyahera tuzosanga hari benshi bahitanywe na Sida
column3: Jeanne Gapiya, umwe mu bazwi cane mu kurwanya Sida mu Burundi, avuga ko kwandura no kurwara Sida bishobora kwiyongera cane mu Burundi n'ahandi kuko uburyo bwo kubirwanya bwagabanutse cane kuva hateye ikiza ca Covid-19. Madame Gapiya ari mu bantu ba mbere bemanze ko bagendana umugera wa Sida mu Burundi mu myaka ya 1980,  igihe ibijanye n'uwo mugera vyari bikiri nk'ibitavugwa. Ishirahamwe ryiwe ryo gushigikira abagendana umugera wa Sida n'abarwaye iyo ndwara (ANSS)  rimaze hafi imyaka 30 kandi arashima aho we n'abandi bakora nkawe bari bagejeje igikorwa co kurwanya Sida. Madame Gapiya, atakiba mu Burundi igihe cose, avuga ko muri ino minsi yagiyeyo agasanga abarwayi ba Sida bamerewe nabi cane. Agira ati: "Nabonye umumama [umuvyeyi] aje kutwitura, yari amaze iminsi mu bitaro... nja kumuraba mbona umenga ni umwana w'imyaka nka  15. "Kubera dusanganywe ikigo gifasha abana barwaye cane , dushobora kuba turagumije, tubaha ivyo barya tubaha imiti gushika aho basubira kumera neza... "Ntangura kubwira abakozi nti jana urya mwana. Bati 'eka si umwana, ni umu mama w'abana 2'". Ibigo  birwanya Sida bisanzwe biha abarwayi bavyitura infungurwa zikenerwa cane kugira baronke intege zo kurinda iyo miti. Gapiya rero avuga ko yasanze ubu hari ubukene bw'ivyo kurya  kuko "uburyo twahora turonka ntabwo tukironka ngo tubafashe". Arongera ati: "Nagiye mu Kirundo, nsangayo uwundi muvyeyi tutazi ko tuzorokora,  afise igituntu akagira n'umugera, n'ibintu tutaheruka. "Ivyo vyose biterwa n'uko abantu bashonje kandi natwe ata buryo dufise bwo kubaha ivyo twahora tubaha". Madame Gapiya avuga ko imigambi mpuzamakungu yahora ibaha uburyo ubu yabuhindukirije mu kurwanya ikiza ca Covid-19. Jeanne Gapiya avuga ko kuva habaye izi ngorane isi yose  irimwo z'ikiza ca Covid-19, gupima  umugera wa Sida bimaze kugabanuka ku rugero rwa 36%. Muri uwo mwanya  bisigura ko abagendana umugera batabizi bariko baranduza abandi. Agira ati: "Nitwagira imana n'ico kiza Covid tukagikira, tuzosanga twarasubiye inyuma, twarabuze abantu benshi cane". Ubundi avuga ko Uburundi bwari mu bihugu biteye imbere mu kurwanya Sida aho muri rusangi hagati ya  70 na 80% y'abategerezwa kuja ku miti  bayironka. Gusa urwo rugero ruracari hasi ku bana, rungana na 30%. Gapiya avuga ko abashikana ijwi kure ari ukubandanya basemerera kuko n'aho intambwe imaze guterwa, Uburundi n'ibindi bihugu na cane cane vyo muri Afrika y'ubuseruko n'iyo mu burengero ngo bikiri inyuma. Imiti igezweho ntirabishikamwo kandi abarwayi bayikenera kuko bishika bakananirwa n'iyo bari basanzweko. Avuga ko  we agira "amahirwe yo kuyironka kuko umushingatahe wanje akora muri Nations Unies [ONU]". "Uko siko ibintu vyategerezwa kugenda".

column2: Burundi: Evariste Ndayishimiye yavuze iki mu butumwa bw’umunsi w’Ukwikukira?
column3: Perezida Evariste Ndayishimiye avuga ko inyuma yo inyuma y'uko Uburundi buhabuje intahe y'ukwikukira bwagumye bugoyagoya bugatangira kubona agahengwe mu 2005 ariko ko mu 2015 hariho abashatse kunyaga iyo ntahe. Mu butumwa bujanye n'umunsi wo guhimbaza intahe y'ukwikukira uhimbazwa uyu munsi mu Burundi, Bwana Ndayishimiye yasavye Abarundi kuzirikana uyu munsi bibuka icipfuzo ca mbere kiri mu ndirimbo y'igihugu ari co : "Shinga icumu mu mashinga…" Agira ati : "Uburundi ntibwoshinga icumu mu mashinga butubatse imigenderanire myiza n'ibindi bihugu n'amashirahamwe mpuzamakungu." Gusa avuga ko Uburundi bwakoze ibishoboka ngo bubanire neza ibindi bihugu "nk'abazimyamuriro" ariko ko hariho ababirenzeko "baratudurumbanya", bafatira Uburundi ingingo z'agahotoro, ngo "vyose bakabikora bihetse kuri benewacu bataye umurongo." Yagize ati : "Muribuka namwe ingene bagerageje gutembagaza inzego zitorewe n'abenegihugu mu mwaka w'2015 Imana igakinga. N'ejo n'ejo bundi, tubimenye kandi tubimenyere, kirazira kikaziririzwa kuvuguruza ijambo ryapfunditswe n'abenegihugu biciye mu matora." Yongeraho ati : "Turashimiye inzego zijejwe umutekano, izijejwe kwivuna abansi, hamwe n'Abarundi bose bahagaze rugabo mu gutesha inkorabara zashatse kutunyaga intahe y'ukwikukira." Mu 2015 harabaye imyiyereko yiyamiriza kwongera kwitoza kw'uwari Perezida Pierre Nkurunziza, bikurikirwa no gushaka gutembagaza ubutegetsi vyaburijwemwo. Leta y'u Burundi yaragirije iy'u Rwanda uruhara muri uwo mugambi mbere ivuga ko benshi mu bawugerageje bahungiye mu Rwanda, leta y'u Rwanda yarabihanye. Kuva ico gihe ubutegetsi bw'ibihugu vyompi burebana ay'ingwe. Bwana Ndayishimiye avuga ko inyuma yo guhabuza Intahe y'ukwikukira mu 1962 Uburundi bwagumye bugwa buvyuka kugera mu 2005 aho avuga ko ari bwo bwongeye "burasanasanwa". Avuga ko kuva ico gihe aribwo hashinzwe imigambi y'ivyo Abarundi bipfuza harimo uko igihugu coba kimeze mu 2025 (Vision 2025). Nubwo Uburundi bwafatiwe ingingo z'ubukungu n'abagiraneza, yavuze ko ivyo babivanyemwo amasomo, ashima ko Ikigo kijejwe gutoza amakori n'amatagisi (OBR) cakoze neza gushika aho Uburundi bushobora kwibako ku bice 90%. Mw'ijambo ryiwe, yavuze ko kugira ngo ico gisata coroherwe mu kurangura imirimo kijejwe kigiye kwubakirwa igorofa igeretse cumi na kabiri (12 niveaux) kizokoreramwo. Amajambo yiwe 'ntaremesha impunzi' Bwana Ndayishimiye avuga ko agomba kwubaka igihugu aho beneco babasha "gukora ku munwa aho bashakiye hose, [no] mu mifuko yabo na ho hakabarizwa amahera yo kwikenura." Igisata ca ONU kijejwe impunzi giharura (mu kwezi kwa gatanu 2020) impunzi z'Abarundi zirenga 300,000 ziganje cane cane mu bihugu vy'akarere. Mw'ijambo ryiwe Bwana Ndayishimiye yasavye impunzi gutahuka iwabo. Impunzi z'Abarundi zimwe zimwe zivuga ko amajambo amaze gushikirizwa na Perezida Evariste Ndayishimiye kuva ashitse ku butegetsi ataremesha impunzi. Evelyne Nuwimana amaze imyaka ine mu nkambi ya Mahama mu Rwanda yabwiye BBC ati:"Mu majambo yiwe twumva ibisa n'ivy'uwo yasubiriye. Nta cizere njewe ndamubonamwo." Mu ijambo ryiwe rigenewe uyu munsi Bwana Ndayishimiye yagize ati : "Amaherezo y'inzira  ni mu nzu", ni mutahe iwanyu mukiri abarundi b'ubuntu, kuko "Inkoko irara mw'ishamba bugaca yacitse inkware"! Uburundi n'u Rwanda, vyaboneye ica rimwe ukwikukira imbere y'ubutegetsi bw'Abakoroni. Gusa uyu munsi ubutegetsi bw'u Rwanda bwahisemwo ko udahimabzwa mu birori ahubwo hahimabzwa umunsi wo kwibohora kw' igenekerezo 04/07 ubwo ingabo za FPR-Inkotanyi zafashe ubutegetsi.

column2: Hugo Santillan: Uyu munye Argentine yasandavye azize ibikomere vy'ingumu
column3: Umuterangumu wo muri Argentine, Hugo Santillan, yishwe n'ibikomere yagize mu mukino wo guterana ingumu, nyuma y'iminsi uwundi muterangumu wo mu Burusiya, Maxim Dadashev, nawe apfuye. Uwo musore w'imyaka 23 yaguye hasi mu rubuga kuwa gatandatu nyuma gatoyi y'urukino rw'urwego WBC Latino Silve rw'abafise ibiro biri hagati. Urwo rukino rwamuhuza na Eduardo Javier Abreu muri Argentine, rwarangiye abo baterangumu babiri banganije. Yajanywe kwa muganga aca arabagwa ku buryo bwihuse ariko aca acikana kuwa kane. Urwego rujejwe umukino wo guterana ingumu kw'isi, World Boxing Council, rwasohoye ubutumwa ku rubuga hwaniro twitter bugira buti "Rest in Peace, Hugo Santillan", canke "Ruhuka amahoro, Hugo Santillan". Santillan ni umuterangumu agira kabiri apfuye ahitanywe n'ibikomere yakuye mu mukino muri ino indwi, nyuma y'urupfu rwa Dadashev rwemejwe kuwa kabiri. Uwo musore w'imyaka 28 yari yashizwe mu bitaro kubera kuvirirana mu bwonko, nyuma y'urukino rw'abafise ibiro vyinshi yakinye na Subreil Matias, rwahagaritswe mu mpera ku ngunga ya 11 ku wa gatanu uheze. Yarabazwe kwa muganga ariko birananirana ko atora mitende. Uwutegura inkino zo guterana ingumu, Kalle Saueland, yanditse kuri twitter kuwa kane agira ati: "Ni indwi ibabaje cane ku mukino wo guterana ingumu".

column2: Sead Kolasinac wa Arsenal yarwanye n'abasuma babiri
column3: Umukinyi w'umupira w'amaguru wo muri Bosnia akiniria ikipe ya Arsenal, ariko aritwa intwari ku mbuga hwaniro nyuma yo kugaragara atana mu mitwe n'abasuma babiri. Abo basuma bari biyoberanije bashaka kwiba imodoka izimvye uwo mukinyi na mugenzi wiwe bari barimwo. Sead Kolasinac yari atwawe mu modoka na rurangiranwa w'Umudage, Mesut Ozil, bari i London igihe ivyo vyaba. Video yagaragaye yerekana Kolasinac ata kirwanisho afise, ahangana n'abasuma babiri bari bambaye inkofero z'abagira kw'ipikipiki. Abo basuma kandi bari bitwje imbukiga, ariko nticabujije Kolasinac kubatesha bagata bakomoka. Ikipe ya Arsenal ivuga ko abo bakinyi bose bameze neza kandi ko ata n'umwe yakomeretse, igipolisi kikaba kiriko kirakora itohoza.

column2: Burundi: Abasenyeri gatolika bavuga ko utunenge mu matora bakibaza niba ivyayavuyemwo vyizigirwa
column3: Inama nkuru y'Abepiskopi b'I Burundi (CECAB) ivuga ko amatora aheruka yo ku wa 20 z'uku kwa gatanu yaranzwe n'utungenge twinshi twatumye ivyayavuyemwo bibaza niba ari ivyo kwizigira. Mw'itangazo baraye basohoye kuri uyu wa 26/5, abepiskopi 'i Burundi bamenyesha ko barungitse indorerezi 2,716 mu makomine yose, zigashobora kuja ku tuzu tw'amatora batoye. Evariste Ndayishimiye niwe yatangajwe ku vy'agateganyo n'umurwi CENI ujejwe amatora ko yatsinze ayo matora n'amajwi 68%, Agathon Rwasa akaza ubwa kabiri n'amajwi 24%. Umugambwe CNL wa Agathon Rwasa be nawe ubwiwe, ntibemera ivyayavuyemwo. Uwutemera ivyatangajwe na CENI afise umunsi ntarengwa w'uyu munsi ku wa gatatu ngo yiture sentare ijejwe kwubahiriza ibwirizwashingiro. Mw'iryo tangazo, abasenyeri bavuga ko muri rusangi amatora yabaye mw'ituze, ariko y'uko hari utunenge twinshi dushingiye kw'ihonyangwa ry'ubwigenge, ukudafata kumwe abitoza n'abatora. Utunenge abo basenyeri bashira ahabona twashoboye kubonwa n'izo ndorerezi zabo aho zashoboye gushika ni utu: "Igitsure catewe bamwe mu baserukiye abitoza ngo batere igikumu ku mpapuro z'ivyegeranyo vy'ivyavuye mu matora imbere y'uko baharura"; "Amasandugu amwe amwe yashizwemo amakarata y'amajwi arenze (bourrage des urnes)"; "Abatoreye abantu bapfuye be n'impunzi"; "Abantu wasanga bafise amakete yo gutorera abandi menshi, ivyo navyo bitemewe". "Mu tuzu tw'amatora tumwe tumwe hari abantu batoye incuro zirenga imwe". "Hari abaserukiye abitoza be n'indorerezi birukanywe mu guharura amajwi". "Hari bamwe mu batora bakorewe iterabwoba baterwa n'igitsure na bamwe mu bategetsi banabaherekeza no mu bwiherero". "Abantu batemewe n'amategeko biyadukiza bakinjira mu bibanza vyo guharuriramwo amajwi". "Gutora mw'ibanga bitubahirijwe". "Bamwe mu bahagarikizi baratswe impapuro zibaha uburenganzira bwo guhagararira amatora banakwa n'amaterefone yabo". Abo basenyeri gatorika mu Burundi babona ko utwo tunenge dutuma bibaza niba ivyari vyitezwe gutangazwa vyizigirwa. Babona kandi ko hari abariko barahohotera canke bashaka guturubika ababanyi babo inyuma y'aya matora, babahora ko badasangiye ivyiyumviro, bagasaba abategetsi guhana abo bantu. Bati: "Mu gihe amategeko yemera ko haba abahiganwa benshi, buri munyagihugu yari afise uburenganzira bwo kwerekana uwo yipfuza gushigikira". Abo basenyeri basaba ko uwumva ko yarenganijwe yokwirinda gukoresha imigumuko, agaca mu nziza y'ubutungane kugira ngo atunganirizwe. Mu matora atatu yabaye kuwa gatatu uheze, ihiganwa ryari rikomeye ryari hagati y'umugambwe CNDD-FDD uri ku butegetsi hamwe na CNL utavuga rumwe nawo. Imigambwe imwe n'abandi bitoje ku giti cabo ku mwanya w'umukuru w'igihugu baremeye ivyavuye mu matora n'ubwo banenze utunenge tumwe tumwe twibonekeje. Hagati aho, umugambwe CNL uvuga ko amatora yabayemwo ubusuma, ukavuga ko washoboye kwegeranya ivyegeranyo vy'amatora vyerekana ko ari wo wayatsinze. Domitien Ndayizeye witoza ashizwe imbere n'urunani Kira Burundi, yabwiye BBC utunenge yabonye twabaye mu matora, ariko avuga ko "igihe uwatowe azoba amaze kwemezwa na CENI ubwa nyuma nta kizomubuza gutwara Uburundi". Umugwi CENI ujejwe gutegura amatora wowo wemeza ko amatora yagenze neza. Sentare ijejwe kwubahiriza ibwirizwashingiro utegerezwa kumenyesha ibiharuro ntabanduka vyayavuyemwo ku wa 04 z'ukwa gatandatu.

column2: Malawi - Covid-19: Incanco 19.610 za AstraZeneca zataye igihe zaturiwe
column3: Malawi yaturiye incanco 19.610 zataye igihe za AstraZeneca, kikaba kibaye igihugu ca mbere ca Afrika gikoze ivyo. Cakurikije impanuro z'ikigo ca Afrika kijejwe kugenzura ingwara 'Africa Centres for Disease Control' (Africa CDC) cemeje ko incanco zarengeje ikiringo ziba zitagikora. Bavuga ko izo ncanco zarengeje ikiringo kandi ko atacerekana na kimwe ko zobandanya gukoreshwa, hishimikijwe ingingo ngenderwako z'ishami rya Onu rijejwe amagara y'abantu kw'isi WHO/OMS. Kibaye igihugu ca mbere ca Afrika gitaye izo ncanco zataye igihe ku mugaragaro. Abategetsi bavuga ko iyo ngingo igamije gutanga icizere kubanye Malawi kugira bazoze guhabwa incanco igihe zizoba zibonetse. BBC ntibazwa ibivuye ku zindi mbuga Gushika ubu, igitigiri c'abicandagisha Covid-19 kiri hasi cane, cane cane bivanye n'ibihuha bivugwa kuri izo ncanco. Abategetsi batinya ko gukoresha incanco zataye igihe vyotuma abantu babatakariza icizere. Reta ya Malawi ifise icizere ko ukwicandagisha kuzokwongerekana igihe bazoronka izindi ncanco z'umugambi wa Covax. Abanye Malawi barenga 330.000 baricandagishije.

column2: Johnson & Johnson yahagaritse igeragezwa ry'urucanco rwa Covid kubera hari uwarwaye
column3: Ikompanyi Johnson & Johnson ikora imiti yo muri Amerika yahagaritse vy'agateganyo igerageza ry'urucanco rwa Covid kugira ngo habanze hakorwe amatohoza ku catumye umwe mu bariko barugeragerezwako arwara. Iyi kompanyi ivuga ko umurwi wigenga uzokwihweza nimba hari isano hagati y'iyi ndwara y'uyu muntu itasiguwe n'imiti bamuteye. Yahagaritse ibikorwa vyo kurondera abandi bakorerwako igerageza ryo ku rwego rugira gatatu mu ntumbero yo kwicungera. Iyi kompanyi ivuga ko iyo hari abantu benshi bariko bageragerezwako, aho usanga baharurwa mu bihumbi mirongo, ni ukwama umuntu yiteze ko hagira abo bigirako ingaruka atari nziza. Iyi kompanyi kandi ivuga ko idashobora gushikiriza vyinshi ku mwidondoro w'uyu muntu mu ntumbero yo kumubikira ibanga. Mw'itangazo yasohoye dusoma tuti: "Turiko turigira vyinshi kandi kuri ino ndwara y'uyu muntu, ni nkenerwa ko tumenya vyose kuri we kugira ngo bishobore gufasha n'abandi". Si rwo rucanco rwa mbere ruhagaritswe vy'agateganyo rwariko rurageragezwa. Mw'igeragezwa ririko rirakorwa n'ishure kaminuza ya Oxford, hari uwariko arageragerezwako nawe nyene yanduye indwara itasiguwe neza biba ngombwa ko babanza guhagarika urucanco rwariko rurakorwa. Ariko mu nyuma rwaje kwemezwa ko ata ngorane rufise, ko rero rushobora gusubira kugeragezwa, kiretse muri Amerika aho abagenduzi bakiganira n'ikompanyi Astra Zeneca. Hafi incanco 180 nizo ziriko zirageragezwa kw'isi yose, ariko nta na rumwe rurashobora guheza kugeragezwa. Urucanco rw'ikompanyi Johnson & Johnson, co kimwe n'uru rwa kaminuza ya Oxford ikorana na Astra Zeneca, rugeze ku ntambwe ishimishije. Johnson & Johnson yatanguye kurondera abantu yogeragerezako mu mpera z'ukw'icenda, ifise intumbero yo kurondera abashika 60.000 ku bigo birenga 200 muri Leta Zunze Ubumwe za Amerika co kimwe no muri Amerika y'Ubumanuko no muri Afrika y'Epfo.

column2: U Burundi ngo naho atawurwaye coronavirus arahaboneka "buriteguye"
column3: Icegera ca mbere c'umukuru w'igihugu c'u Burundi, Gaston Sindimwo, yabwiye BBC ko ico gihugu citeguye kurwanya coronavirus naho ata wanduye uwo mugera arahaboneka. U Burundi ni kimwe mu bihugu bike kw'isi gushika uyu munsi hataraboneka umugwayi wa coronavirus. Ariko mu ntumbero yo kuzitira bataronerwa, leta yaramaze gufata ingingo zo gukumira ico kiza. Muri izi harimwo guhimiriza abantu kudafata ingendo, baba abinjira mu gihugu canke abashaka gusohoka hamwe no guhagarika uruja n'uruza rw'indege mu kiringo c'iminsi indwi. Basaba kandi abanyagihugu kwirinda kwegerana aho bishoboka, ndetse no gukoranako. Icegera ca mbere c'umukuru w'igihugu Gaston Sindimwo yadusobanuriye ko ari nayo mpamvu mu nama nshikiranganji y'uno munsi baramukanije badakorana mu ntoke nk'uko bimenyerewe. Yagiranye ikiganiro na Florentine Kwizera, ushobora kwumva aho hejuru.

column2: Slovenia: Igishusho ca Melania Trump, umugore wa perezida wa USA, caraturiwe
column3: Igishusho c'umugore wa Perezida Trump,  Melania Trump cari gikozwe mu biti bivugwa ko caturiwe aho cari kimanitswe hafi y'aho avuka mu gihugu ca Slovenia mu Bulayi, baca baragikuraho. Brad Downey, umuhinga mu gushushanya yari yakoresheje ico gishusho, avuga ko caturiwe kw'igenekerezo rya 04 z'uku kw'indwi, umunsi Amerika ihimbaza intahe y'ukwikukira. Uyo munyamerika asanzwe aba mu gisagara ca Berlin mu Budagi yaciye asaba ko ico gishusho cari cononekaye gikurwaho ku munsi ukurikira. Igipolisi cabwiye itororokanirizo ry'amakuru Reuters ko amatohoza yatanguye. Ibiro vy'umukuru w'igihugu vya Amerika ntivyashatse kugira ico bibivuzeko. Ico gishusho cari cakozwe mu giti gishirwa hanze y'igisagara ca Sevnica aho Melania yavukiye muri Slovenia. Cerekana Melania Trump yambaye ikanzu isa n'ubururu isa n'iyo yari yambaye igihe umugabo wiwe yimikwa catumye, abantu bavuga vyinshi igihe kimanikwa mu kw'indwi 2019. Bamwe mu baba muri ico gisagara bavuze ko ico gishusho kimuteje isoni nk'umugore w'umukuru w'igihugu. Bwana Downey yabwiye Rueters ko icipfuzo ciwe ari ukumenya abasambuye ico gishusho n'ico bashaka. Kubw'iwe, ico gishusho cari gutuma haba ibiganiro ku bijanye n'icuka ca politike kiri muri Amerika, harimwo n'ikibazo nkoramutima c'abimukira. Umugore wiwe yavukiye yongera akurira muri Slovenia igihe iki gihugu cari kikiri intara y'icahoze ari Yougoslavia, mu nyuma akaba yagiye kwimukira muri Amerika mu myaka ya 1990. Ico gishusho muri Slovenia casambuye mu gihe ibishusho vy'abategetsi batandukanye ba Amerika bagize uruhara mu bucakara vyariko birabomorwa bivuye ku myiyerekano yo kwiyamiriza ivanguramoko rishingiye ku rukoba. Mu majambo yiwe aherutse gushikiriza, harimwo n'iryo yavuze ku munsi wo guhimbaza intahe y'ukwikukira, Perezida Donald Trump wa Amerika yariyamirije bikomeye abonona n'abasambura ivyo bishusho. Kuva Trump atowe nk'umukuru w'igihugu ca Leta Zunze Ubumwe za Amerika mu 2016, Sevnica cabaye igisagara cakira ingenzi nyinshi ahanini zashaka kumenya vyinshi ku mamuko ya Melania Trump n'ubuto bwiwe. Mu kwezi kw'umunani umwaka uheze, igishusho cerekana Perezida Trump carubatswe muri Slovenia, mu buseruko bw'umugwa mukuru Ljubljana, naco nyene kikaba catateye impari nk'uko vyagenze ku gishusho c'umugore wiwe. Ico gishusho capima uburebure bw'imetero umunani naco nyene caraturiwe n'abantu batamenyekanye mu kwa mbere kw'uno mwaka.

column2: Tanzania ihakana gukubagura impunzi z'abarundi bivugwa na HRW
column3: Reta ya Tanzania iriyamiriza ivyashikirijwe n'ishirahamwe Human Rights Watch (HRW) ko ico gihugu gipfunga, kikaboreza igufa kikongera kigatahukana impunzi z'abarundi ku nguvu. Dr Hassan Abbas, umuvugizi wa reta ya Tanzania, yabwiye BBC igisata c'igiswahili ko izo nkuru za HRW ata ho zifatiye kandi ata kuri kurimwo. Uwo muvugizi avuga kandi ko ari "inkuru zo gupfundikanya", aho usanga bavuga ko bavuganye n'abantu badashaka ko amazina y'abo amenyekana. Avuga ko igihugu ca Tanzania gifise umuco wo kwakira impunzi kuva kera. Agira ati: "Twebwe twatanguye kwakira impunzi imbere y'uko amakungu ashiraho itegeko ritegeka ibihugu vyose gutanga ubuhungiro ku mpunzi no kuzikingira mu 1951. "Twebwe kuva mu myaka ya za 30 [1930] na 40 [1940] tuguma twakira impunzi, twakoresheje uburyo bwinshi bwa reta n'igihugu, twateguye ibibanza vyinshi cane twashizemwo amakambi y'impunzi z'ababanyi bacu igihe cose bagize ibibazo. "Rero inkuru nk'izo nibaza ko ico zishaka gushikako, ntitubihe agaciro, kuko n'uyu musi tuvugana tubandanya kwakira impunzi." Dr Abbas avugira reta ya Tanzania, arahakana kandi ko ata kete ishirahamwe HRW ryigeze ryandikira reta ya Tanzania. Avuga kandi ko igihe hoba ikibazo ico ari co cose ku mpunzi ziri muri Tanzania, bari kubishikiriza ishirahamwe rijejwe impunzi (HCR) hamwe n'ubutegetsi bakabitorera inyishu. Agira ati: "Tanzania ntishobora gufata nabi impunzi yo nyene yemeye kwakira, twari gushobora kwanka kubakira ariko twarabakiriye, barakingirwa n'amakungu, baba mu gihugu cacu gushika aho igihugu cabo kizoronkera amahoro. "Twoja gute mu bikorwa vyo gufata nabi iyo mpunzi? Ni co gituma mvuga ko ivyo vyegeranyo twovyihoza tukabandanya n'akazi kacu." Mu ndwi iheze ishirahamwe HRW ryagirije abategetsi ba Tanzania guhonyanga bikomeye agateka k'abarundi b'impunzi n'abakirondera ubuhungiro. Mu cegeranyo caryo, iryo shirahamwe rivuga ko igipolisi ca Tanzania n'abajejwe iperereza banyuruje abantu, bababoreza igufa bongera banabapfunga hadakurikijwe amategeko. HRW ivuga ko ivyo vyabaye n'imiburiburi ku barundi 11, banarajwe ahantu habi indwi zitari zike ku gituro c'igipolisi ca Kibondo mu ntara ya Kigoma. Igasaba reta ya Tanzania kugira amatohoza yihuta kandi ataho yegamye. Impunzi zirenga 150.000 ziba mu makambi ya Tanzania, benshi muri bo bakaba bahunze imidurumbanyo yakurikiye ingingo y'uwari umukuru w'igihugu ico gihe, Pierre Nkurunziza, yo kwitoreza ikiringo kigira gatatu mu 2015. Hagati aho, abaserukira impunzi z'abarundi zatse indaro mu gihugu ca Tanzania, bandikiye ikete ishirahamwe mpuzamakungu ONU basaba ko bokwimurirwa mu kindi gihugu kuko Tanzania isa n'iyiriko irabirukana.

column2: Coronavirus: Umukuru w'igihugu ca Ghana yifatiye ingingo ya Guma mu rugo
column3: Umukuru w'igihugu ca Ghana, Nana Akufo-Addo, yifatiye ingingo ya guma mu rugo mu kiringo c'iminsi 14 ku mpanuro yahawe n'abaganga, inyuma y'aho umwe mu bamwegereye yapimwe agasanga yaranduye wa mugera coronavirus. Iyo ngingo yamenyeshejwe mw'itangazo ryaraye risohowe na leta y'igo gihugu ejo ku wa gatandatu, rivuga riti: "Uno munsi nta mugera bamutoye, ariko yahisemwo iyi ngingo mu kwinengesera". Iryo tangazo rivuga ariko ko Perezida Akufo-Addo azobandanya akora akazi muri ico kiringo cose, ariko akurikiza ingingo zose zijanye no kwikingira Covid-19. Hagati aho, iryo tangazo ntirimenyesha nimba  uyo muntu amwegereye ari umukozi canke ari uyo mu muryango wiwe. Gushika ubu, igihugu ca Ghana giharurwamwo abanduye coronavirus 19.388, kikaba ari kimwe mu bihugu vyo munsi y'ubugaragwa bwa Afrika bifise ibitigiri binini vy'abanduye. Muri abo, 117 barahitanywe n'iyo ndwara, nayo 14.330 nabo bakaba bayikize. Icegera c'umushikiranganji w'ubudandaji n'amahinguriro muri ico gihugu co mu burengero bwa Afrika, Carlos Kingsley Ahenkorah, yaratanze imihoho hirya y'ejo ku wa gatanu kubera yarenze ku mategeko ya guma mu rugo inyuma y'aho apimiwe agasanga yaranduye.

column2: Lausane: Francine Niyonsaba uwa mbere mw'ihiganwa rya Diamond League ku metero 3000
column3: Umurundikazi Francine Niyonsaba yatahukanye ikibanza ca mbere mw'ihiganwa rya Diamond League ryariko rirabera i Lausane mu Buswisse ku metero 3000. Uwo  murundikazi aherutse guhabwa icubahiro co kwitwa ambasaderi yasize isegunda imwe gusa umunye Amerika Alicia Monson. Francine Niyonsaba yagize iminoto 8:26:80 na we Monson agira iminota 8:26:81. Aganira na radio BBC Gahuza, inyuma yo gutahukana iyo ntsinzi, Francine Niyonsaba yagize ati:" N'ukuri simfise ingene nobivuga, naryohewe cane gutsinda rino higanwa. "Ryari ihiganwa ritoroshe na gato, kuko abo twari kumwe bose bashobora gutsinda, ariko mba inshirwarimenetse. "Natsindishije ubwenge bwinshi cane kuko urabona ko twatandukanijwe n'amafoto yo kuri "ligne d'arrivee" (ku murongo wa nyuma dushikirako). Ihiganwa rya nyuma rya Diamnond League ritegekanijwe itariki 6 z'ukwezi kw'icenda mu 2022. Mu kwezi kw'icenda mu 2021, Francine Niyonsaba yabaye umugore wa mbere anyaruka gusumba abandi kw'isi ku metero 2000. I Zagreb muri Croatia, yanditse amateka mu guca umuhigo kw'isi ahejeje izo metero ku minota 5:21:56. Francine Niyonsaba w'imyaka 28 ari mu banonotsi benshi babujijwe guhiganwa ku metero ziri hagati ya 400 na 1.500 kubera baremanywe imisemburo (testosterone) myinshi.

column2: Papa Francis ati: 'Imana idukunda twese, n’aho woba uri umunyakibi ruhebwa'
column3: Papa Francis yahimbaje umunsi mukuru wa Noel avuga ko Imana idukunda twese - "Ninkozi z'ibibi ruhebwa". Yashikirije iryo jambo imbere y'abantu ibihumbi n'ibihumbi bari mu gisabisho c'ijoro rya Noel kw'isengero rikuru i Vaticano ryitiriwe Umutakatifu Petero. Ati: "Ufise kuba  uri mu vyiyumviro bibi, ufise kuba warakoze ibi ruhebwa…ariko Imana ibandanya igukunda". Hari bamwe babona ko yashikirije ayo majambo afatiye ku mabi yagirizwa bamwe mu barongoye Ekleziya Katolika, harimwo ibijanye n'ugufata ku nguvu, nk'uko bishikirizwa n'umumenyeshamakuru wa BBC. Mu masaha yo ku mugoroba, Papa Francis aza gusubira mw'iyo sengero y'Umutakatifu Petero i Vaticano aho nk'uko vyama aza gushikiriza isi yose ijambo rya Papa risanzwe ryitezwe. Mu bitavye iyo misa harimwo abana batowe mu bihugu, harimwo nka za Venezuela, Irak na Uganda. Umumenyeshamakuru wa BBC i Roma, Mark Lowen, avuga ko vyerekana ko Papa afise ku mutima abakatolika baharurwa mu muliyaridi 1 n'ibice bitatu kw'isi, ashimikiye cane cane ku ngorane zihanze abimukira n'abari mu ntambara kw'isi yose. Uyo mu papa w'imyaka 83 akomoka muri Argentine yavuze ati: "Noel itwibutsa ko Imana ibandanya itwereka urukundo idufitiye, n'aho twoba turi abanyavyaha ruhebwa. Kuri jewe, ku muntu uwo ari we wese, uno munsi itubwira iti: 'Ndagukunda kandi nzokwama ndagukunda, kuko mu maso yanje uri ngirakamaro'". Imana ntigukunda kubera wiyumvira ugakora ivyiza. Igukunda ataco irabiyeko, vyonyene gusa. Urukundo rwayo ntiruva ku kungene umeze". Papa yanacishijemwo n'ibijanye n'amabi avugwa muri Ekleziya, hamwe n'isesagurwa ry'umutungo wa Ekleziya. Ati: "Nimba hari ibitagenda neza mu buzima bwacu, nimba hari ibitagenda neza muri Ekleziya, n'aho hoba ibibazo bimeze gute kw'isi, ivyo ntibizotubera inyendamuvano". Kuva mu bisagara vya Australia gushika mu mashure muri Irlande eka mbere no mu bisagara vya Amerika, Ekleziya Katolika yarahuye n'ibibazo vy'abayirongoye bagirizwa gufata ku nguvu abana kuva mu myaka mirongo iheze. Hari ibirego bikomeye n'abantu batanga ivyemezo vy'ivyo vyaha vyavuzwe cane mu matohoza abandanya akorwa. Mu biheruka, umukardinali wa Australia George Pell yarakubiswe intahe mu gahanga na sentare ko yafashe ku nguvu uduhungu tubiri two mu gisagara ca Melbourne muri Australia mu 1996. Uyo mukardinali yanahoze ajejwe ubutunzi i Vaticano - bisigura ko yaboneka nk'umutegetsi agira gatatu muri Ekleziya - niwe mutegetsi mukuru wa Ekleziya muri Australia yagirijwe ico caha. Mu ndwi iheze, Papa yarakoze impinduka zikomeye cane mu guhindura ibijanye "n'ibanga ry'ubupapa" ryatumye ivyo guhohotera abana vyakorwa n'abategetsi ba Ekleziya bisasirwa indava muri kahise. Imbere y'aho, Ekleziya yaragira ibanga ibijanye n'ugufata abana ku nguvu, mu vyafatwa ko kwari ukugerageza kugumiriza ibanga ababikorewe n'ababikoze. Ariko, ingingo nshasha yarakuyeho izo nzitizi zahora zibuza abantu kumenyesha ivyababayeko, canke ababibakoreye. Papa Francis agize iminsi atoroherezwa kuko hari benshi bamusaba gufata ingingo ruhasha kugira ngo arwanye ako kabi kiziziye Ekleziya muri ino myaka ya vuba.

column2: USA: Inyuma y'impari abakenguzamateka bemeranije ko urubanza rwo kubogoza Trump rwogenda
column3: Inama nkenguzamateka ya Amerika bumvikanye ku kungene urubanza rwo kubogoza Perezida Donald Trump rugiye kubandanya inyuma y'impari zamaze amasaha 13 baterana amajambo. Abagiriza Bwana Trump bo ku ruhande rw'aba Democrates bateranye amajambo n'abamuburanira, mu gihe abo mu mugambwe w'aba Republicains biyamirije ivyasabwa ko hotumwako ibindi vyabona. Urubanza ruza kubandanya uno munsi wa gatatu aho abamwagiriza baza gushikiriza ibirego vyabo, hanyuma abamuburanira nabo bisigure hongere habazwe n'ibibazo. Bwana Trump abaye umu perezida agize gatatu asabiwe kubogozwa mu mateka ya Amerika. Yagirizwa gukoresha ububasha ahabwa n'ubutegetsi mu gukora amakosa hamwe no kuburabuza inama nshingamateka yariko imukorako amatohoza. Arahakana ivyo yagirizwa. Nk'uko bavyumvikanye mu ntahe y'icese ya mbere yabaye ejo ku wa kabiri, ikaba yagiye kurangira uno munsi ku wa gatatu, buri ruhande ruzoronka amasaha ashika 24 kugira ngo begeranye ibirego. Ico gikorwa gitegekanijwe gutangura kuri uyu wa gatatu ku muhingamo. Ivyo biheze, kumbure mu ntango z'indwi iza, abakenguzamateka bazoronswa akaryo ko kubaza ibibazo mu kiringo c'amasaha 16. Inyuma y'aho bazosubira bihweze ikibazo cerekeye gutumako ibindi vyabona. Abo mu mugambwe w'aba Democrates bipfuza kwumviriza abahoze ari abahanuzi mu biro kwa perezida bakoranye hafi cane na Bwana Trump. Aho harimwo umukuru mfatakibanza w'ibiro vya Perezida, Mick Mulvaney, hamwe n'uwahoze ari umuhanuzi muvyo umutekano, John Bolton. Hagati aho, aba Republicains nka bose ntibipfuza ko abo bantu barengutswa. Biciye mu matora aho aba Republicains ari 53 aba Democrates 47, Inama nkenguzamateka yahagaritse integuro zitatu zose z'aba Democrates zari rijanye no kurondera ingene baronka inzandiko hamwe n'ivyemezo vyerekeye urubanza rw'ibogozwa rya Trump. Abakenguzamateka baburijemwo iciyumviro c'umukuru w'abakenguzamateka b'aba Democrates, Chuck Schumer, co gutumako impapuro ziri mu biro vy'umukuru w'igihugu zerekana ivyo Trump yakoranye n'igihugu ca Ukraine. Bahagaritse kandi umugambi wo gusaba impapuro z'ivyakozwe mu bunyamabanga bwa leta hamwe no mu biro vy'umukuru w'igihugu bijejwe ikoreshwa ry'amafaranga. Abakenguzamateka b'aba Republicains kandi basubije inyuma umugambi w'aba Democrates wo kurengukisha Bwana Bolton yamenyesheje ko yari kwitaba akamo mu gihe bomutumako. Mw'ijambo ryiwe ry'ukwugurura ibikorwa, Adam Schiff, arongoye umurwi w'abashingamateka b'aba Democrates bagiriza Trump, yavuze ko Abanyamerika nka bose "batizeye ko urubanza ruzogenda neza". Ati: "Ntibizeye ko inama nkenguzamateka itazohengama. Barazi ko ibizova mu rubanza vyamaze gutegurwa". Umurwi w'abanyamategeko baburanira umukuru w'igihugu wari wasavye ko yambikwa izera bidatevye, bakavuga ko urwo rubanza "ruhonyanga ibwirizwashingiro". Mu gihe bariko baraterana amajambo, harageze igihe umucamanza Roberts anegura impande zompi azisaba kwibuka ko bariko babwira "urwego rwa mbere kw'isi rufata ingingo".

column2: Ibanki nkuru y’u Burundi igabisha amashirahamwe acuruza amafaranga atisunze amategeko
column3: Umuyobozi w'igisata kijejwe kugenzura amabanki mw'ibanki nkuru y'igihugu c'u Burundi, Prosper Ngendanganya, asaba amashirahamwe acuruza amafaranga kwubahiriza amategeko yashinzwe n'ibanki nkuru y'igihugu. Ni inyuma y'umubonano hagati y'iyo banki n'amashirahamwe agura akagurisha amafaranga wabaye  ku munsi wa kane w'iyi ndwi mu ntumbero y'ukwibutsa ayo mashirahamwe amategeko mashasha n'igituma adakurikizwa. Ku wa 17 z'ukwezi kw'icenda uno mwaka, ibanki nkuru y'igihugu, BRB, yasohoye itegeko rishasha rigenga urucuruza rw'amafaranga mu ntumbero y'ukurwanya abikika mu kiza bakagura bakanagurisha ku biciro vy'umurengera amafaranga y'agaciro. Mw'itangazo yasohoye ejo ku wa gatanu, bwana Ngendakumana yaragabishije ko amashirahamwe n'amazu acuruza amafaranga y'agaciro adakurikije amategeko azofatwa nk'ayahungabanya umutekano w'igihugu. Avuga ko ishirahamwe rizofatwa ririko riragurisha ibiciro ry'ishakiye ko rizofatwa nk'umwansi w'igihugu kandi ko rizohanwa hisunzwe igatabu mpanavyaha. Ibanki nkuru y'igihugu imenyesha kandi ko urudandazwa rutemewe n'amategeko (marché noir) rw'amafaranga y'agaciro rwasubiye kwibonekeza cane cane mu gisagara ca Bujumbura. BRB ikababazwa n'uko ayo mashirahamwe adashaka gufasha mu kwerekana abo badandaza bo mu kinyegero bakora batubahiriza ibiciro biba vyashinzwe na BRB. Mu rugamba rwo kurwanya urudandazwa ruteye kubiri n'amategeko, ibanki nkuru y'igihugu yaremereye agashirukabute umuntu azoshobora kwerekana ishirahamwe canke inzu izogura canke izogurisha amafaranga y'agaciro hatisunzwe iryo tegeko rishasha, aho azoronswa ibihumbi 500 vy'amafaranga y'amarundi. Ni mu gihe uwuzokwerekana umuntu canke ishirahamwe rikora ritazwi n'ibanki nkuru y'igihugu nawe azorosnwa ibice 10 kw'ijana (10%) vy'amafaranga yose azoba afashwe. Kuva Uburundi bwinjiye mu ngorane za politike mu mwaka wa 2015, ibihugu bimwe bimwe vyahora bifasha u Burundi vyahagaritse imfashanyo vyahora biha ico gihugu, ivyagize ingaruka mbi ku butunzi bwaco, bituma kani amafaranga y'agaciro akena.

column3: Aba ba Islamukazi basanga kwambara umudeli mwiza bidasigura kutikwiza. Bafashe umugambi wo guhingura impuzu z'Abaislamukazi z'imideli myiza kandi bakambara bikwije.

column2: Papa Francis: Gatolika yakoze amakosa mu "gucinyiza imico y'abandi"
column3: Umwungere wa Elkeziya Gatolika, Papa Francis, yavuze ko iryo shengero ryakoze amakosa mu gushimikira ku muco umwe gusa, rimwe na rimwe hakanakoreshwa inguvu mu gushika ku mugambi waryo Papa yavuze yuko ivyo vyahombeje Ishengero ubutunzi butandukanye bwo mu mico n'imigenzo myinshi. Yavuze yuko inyigisho z'ishengero zerekanye yuko hakwiye kwubahirizwa "inkomoko y'umuco n'akaranga vya buri muntu." Ivyo Papa Francis yabivugiye mu mubonano rusangi uba buri wa gatati i Vaticano. Abivuze mu gihe hari umwidogo ku mugabane wa Amerika y'ubumanuko ku vyagizwe igihe Espagne yigarurira ico gice c'isi ikanashira mu bukoroni ba kavukire baho. Kuwa kabiri umukuru w'igisagara ca Mexico mu gihugu ca Mexique yavuze yuko igishusho c'umugore kavukire kizosubirira ica Christopher Columbus (afatwa nk'uwatoye aho umugabane wa Amerika uri) muri kimwe mu bice bikomeye vy'uwo muji.

column2: Coup d’Etat muri Burkina Faso : Lieutenant-Colonel Paul-Henry Sandaogo Damiba ni nde?
column3: Umuhari 'Le Mouvement Patriotique pour la Sauvegarde et la Restauration' urongowe na Lieutenant-Colonel Paul-Henri Sandaogo Damila. Ariko none uwo akuye ubutegetsi bwa prezida Roch Marc Kabore ni nde? Lieutenant-Colonel Paul-Henri Sandaogo Damiba w'imyaka 41, n'umusirikare mukuru mu bagwanira ku butaka muri Burkina Faso. Yahora arongoye intara ya gatatu ya gisirikare irimwo na Ouagadougou, umugwa mukuru. Colonel Damiba yahoze ari mu basirikare bacungera umukuru w'igihugu, yahoze acungera ubuzima bwa Blaise Compaore, imbere y'uko bavana mu 2011 inyuma y'igumuka ry'igisirikare. Mu 2015, ari mu basirikare bakuru biyamirije itembegazwa ry'ubutegetsi n'ico gisata nyene c'abasirikare bacungera umukuru w'igihugu, urwo rwego rukaba rwaciye rufutwa. Yarahamagawe nk'icabona mu rububanza kuko yari yavuganye umwanya muremure na Gen Djibril Bassole. Kuva mu 2016, ari imbere mu ntambara yo kugwanya iterabwoba. Yaragiye mu mahugurwa nka yose ahariwe ibisata vya gisirikare bidasanzwe. Yarananditse n'igitabo citwa:  Armées ouest-africaines et terrorism : réponses incertaines? Paul-Henri Damiba yararongoye ibisata vyinshi vya gisirikare harimwo  Dori na Ouahigouya, intara yiziziwe n'ibitero. Prezida wa  Mouvement Patriotique pour la Sauvegarde et la Restauration biganye na Emmanuel Zoungrana, yahagaritswe itariki 8 z'uku kwezi kwa mbere 2022 yagirizwa gushaka kubangamira   umutekano w'igihugu.

column2: China: Rurangiranwa mu kuvuza piano Li Yundi yapfunzwe yagirizwa kugura imaraya
column3: Rurangiranwa mu kuvuza piano mu Bushinwa, Li Yundi, apfunzwe azira gusambana n'imaraya, nk'uko bivugwa n'ikinyamakuru ca reta. Ku rubuga hwaniro, igipolisi canditse ko umugabo w'imyaka 39 hamwe n'imaraya y'imyaka 29, bemeye ko bakoze ibintu bitemewe n'amategeko. Bafashwe inyuma y'aho abanyagihugu batangiye iyo nkuru ku bategetsi. Mu gihe igipolisi kitashize ahabona izina ryiwe, ikinyamakuru ca reta mu nyuma cemeje ko ari Li. Iyo nkuru yababaje abakunzi benshi b'uwo mugabo azwi kw'izina rya "China Piano Prince". Ku myaka 18, Li yabaye umuntu wa mbere akiri muto avuza piano - ahawe agashimwe ka mbere gakomeye mpuzamakungu ka Chopin Piano Competition mu 2000. Yabandanije avuza piano hirya no hino kw'isi, akaba n'umuntu azwi cane mu bantu bavuga ururimi rw'igishinwa. Umuntu umwe yanditse ku rubuga hwaniro rwa Weibo rumeze nka Twitter ati:"Mana yanje, biratangaje. Uyu ni Li Yundi twese dutangarira?" Abandi berekana amakenga ku kuntu yafashwe. Undi yanditse ngo:"Mfise amakenga yo kumenya ingene abantu bamenye ko ari we. Ubonye umugabo w'imyaka 39 n'umugore w'imyaka 29 binjiye mu nzu bari kumwe, bigenda gute ngo abantu bamenye ko ari imaraya, na we ari umukiriya wiwe?" Inyuma y'aho iyo nkuru imenyekaniye, ishirahamwe ry'abanyamuziki mu Bushinwa ryavuze ko rigiye kwaka ubunywanyi Li kuko "atanga isura mbi cane mu bantu". Bamwe mu baraba ibintu n'ibindi bavuga ko ipfungwa ryiwe rishobora gufatwa nk'igabishwa ku nyifato mbi y'abandi ba rurangiranwa mu gihe Ubushinwa bwahagurukiye abakora akazi kerekeye umuziki. Mu mategeko yo mu Bushinwa, abasambana canke bagurisha imaraya bashobora gupfungwa gushika ku misi 15 bakanatangisha n'amande ashobora gushika ku madolari ya amerika 782.

column2: Kenya-Ruto: Icegera c'umukuru w'igihugu aravuga ku kubuzwa urugendo
column3: Icegera c'umukuru wa Kenya William Ruto avuga ko ingingo  y'abategetsi yo kumubuza   gufata urugendo rwo kuja mu  gihugu kibanyi ca Uganda ari integuro yo kumutera umutima mubi nk'icegera c'umukuru w'igihugu no kubangamira ivyo yifuza gushikako muri poritike. Mu kiganiro n'iradiyo yo muri Kenya (Inooro FM) mu gitondo co kuri uyu wa gatatu, William Ruto yavuze ko muri kahise yari amaze gufata ingendo z'akazi canke ziwe bwite ata ntambamyi. Yasiguye ko urugendo rwiwe rwari rugamije kwigira ku kigega c'ubutunzi muri  Uganda mu ntumbero y'umugambi w'ubutunzi  aherutse gutanguza wa 'Bottoms Up' - ugamije guteza imbere ubuzima bw'abantu baronka amikoro make nk'inzira yo kuzamura ubutunzi bwa Kenya. Abajijwe igituma umukuru w'igihugu ata na kimwe yari azi kuri urwo rugendo, Ruto yaciye yigovyora mu kubaza ngo: ''Urazi neza ko umukuru w'igihugu atarwo yari azi?' Harun Aydin ajemwo gute? Ruto yabandanije avuga ko mu myaka icenda amaze ari icegera c'umukuru w'igihugu atari bwigere asabwa kubanza gusaba uruhusha ku ngendo ziwe zo hanze  y'igihugu, aca anibaza igituma ivyo bishitse ubu. Ruto  yanatanze umuco ku muntu aturuka muri Turkiya, Harun Aydin yari  ku rutonde rw'abo bari kujana muri urwo  rugendo. Yavuze ko Aydin ari umugwizatunga afise imitahe muri Kenya, akaba anashaka kwagurira ibikorwa vyiwe muri Uganda na Tanzania. Umwidondoro n'ubutumwa bw'uwo mugwizatunga vyatumye hari ibibazo vyibazwa biranavugwa cane mu binyamakuru bitandukanye mu gihugu. Icegera c'umukuru w'igihugu yavuze ko ari ''ugusara hamwe na poritike itagira agaciro'' gufata uwo munyamahanga nk'uwokekwa kuba uwukora iterabwoba  ata kindi kibitumye atari uko yari amuherekeje. Ku wa mbere, inyuma yo kurindira amasaha   atatu kugira yemerewe gufata urugendo, icegera c'umukutu w'igihugu yahavuye abuzwa kwurira indege yo kuja muri Uganda. Amategeko ya reta ya Kenya asaba abakozi  bakuru  ba reta gusaba uruhusha umukuru w'akazi ka reta imbere yo  gufata ingendo zo  mu bindi bihugu - ariko kubuza icegera c'umukuru w'igihugu gufata urugendo ntaho  vyari bwigere  biba. Umukuru wa Kenya Uhuru Kenyatta n'icegera ciwe ntibagifitaniye ubucuti bari bafitaniye bagitangura amabanga yo kurongora igihugu mu 2013. Ubwo bucuti bwabo bwatosekaye kuva umunsi Prezida Uhuru Kenyatta akorana mu minwe n'uwutavuga  rumwe na reta Raila Odinga mu 2018. Kuva ico gihe icegera c'umukuru w'igihugu yaciye aba nk'uwushizwe ku ruhande mu bikorwa vy'icese vya reta. Umutegetsi wo muri reta ya Uganda Duncan Abigaba, yari asanzwe ariwe ahuza ibikorwa vy'urugendo rw'icegera c'umukuru w'igihugu,  yemereye BBC ko  vy'ukuri Ruto yari yitezwe muri Uganda mu butumwa bwiwe bwite. Yasiguye ko Ruto hari inyungu arondera mu gisata c'uburimyi bw'urudandazwa no gukorera ku mugambi wiwe wo  kuri kaminuza ya Makerere wo gushinga igisata c'ivyigwa vy'uburongozi, the Dr.William Samoei Ruto Centre for Leadership. Mu kwezi guheze icegera c'umukuru w'igihugu yahagarariye itanguza rw'uruganda rw'urucanco muri Uganda ku butumire bwa prezida Yoweri Museveni. Ariko ubushikiranganji bwa Uganda bujejwe imigenderanire bwavuze ko ata rugendo rw'icegera c'umukuru wa Kenya bwari buzi. Ministre wa reta ajejwe imigenderanire, Oryem Okello yasiguye ko urwo rugendo rutamenyeshejwe ubushikiranganji bwiwe kandi ko n'abakira abashitsi batari biteguriye umuzo wiwe.

column2: Uganda: Uwigize umuhanuzi w'idini yakubise abayoboke yapfunzwe
column3: Umugabo wo muri Uganda yigize umuhanuzi w'idini yagirijwe ivyaha vyo guhohotera no gukora urudandaza rw'abantu. Umuhanuzi Kintu Dennis w’ishengero Hoima Empowerment Church International yabonetse muri video yarabwe cane ariko arakubita inkoni abayoboke b’ishengero ryiwe. Igipolisi cafashe uwo mugabo w’imyaka 42 kuwa gatatu w’ino ndwi ari kumwe n’abandi bayoboke b’iryo shengero bane nyuma y’aho iyo video yitwariwe. Afatwa amasanamu ariko arategeka abakozi bo mw’ishengero ngo baje imbere y’isengero bakubitwe canke bahebe kugaruka mu masengesho bace banatakaza amahirwe yo gukora kuri microphone yiwe. Ico gihe cose, abaje gusenga bagumye barorera mu gihe abo bakozi baza barakubitwa umwe inyuma y’uwundi hariko haravuga akaziki koroheje ka piano. Umuhanuzi Kintu yabariye abakora itohoza ko yariko arasubiramwo ivyo Yezu yakoze, igihe yasanga abantu bariko baradandariza mw’isengero, nk’uko biri mu rwandiko rw’igipolisi. Abajejwe intwaro kandi bavuga yuko yayobora iryo shengero atavyemerewe n’amategeko. Ugusaka kwakozwe m’iryo sengero kwatoye inkoni zitatu igipolisi kivuga yuko ari zo zakoreshwa mu gukubita abayoboke. Kintu Dennis yagumijwe mw’ibohera gushika itari indwi Nyakanga (9). Uganda ifise amashengero menshi ya gi-Kristu akorera hose mu gihugu. Ntagenzurwa kandi menshi muri yo atwarwa n’abagabo canke abagore biyita intumwa z’Imana.

column2: Kuki Uburundi buza imbere mu bihugu  bikenye cane kw’isi?
column3: Reta y’Uburundi ikwiye kuva mu majambo ikaja mu bikorwa kugira ngo ishobore kwikura mu kabaregwa ko kwitwa igihugu gikenye kurusha ibindi kw’isi, niko Faustin Ndikumana, umukuru w’ishirahamwe PARCEM, ahanura. Ibanki y’isi yose iheruka gusohora icegeranyo c’umwaka wa 2021 ku butunzi n’imibereho y’abanyagihugu gishira Uburundi mu kibanza c’inyuma, ivyatumye benshi bongera kwihweza kw’iterambere ry’Uburundi. Mu kiganiro na BBC, Ndikumana avuga ko imwe mu ngorane nyamukuru Uburundi bufise ari igiturire, akavuga ko mbere ‘ivyo kukirwanya biriko birasubira inyuma ugereranije n’uko vyari bimeze kera’. Mu gihe umukuru w’igihugu Evariste Ndayishimiye yiyemeje kurwanya igiturire, Ndikumana abona ko ubutungane kuri we ari inzitizi ikomeye. Ati: “Agerageza gute kukirwanya mu gihe ubutungane butariko burakora. Ugushaka ndavyumva, mugabo ubutungane butariko burakora, ntashobora kuvuga ngo uriko urarwanya igiturire”. Umukuru w’iri shirahamwe ryishinze gukangurira Abarundi guhindura ingendo abona ko Uburundi budashobora guterimbere mu gihe hakiri ibihushane iyo hageze gushira mu ngiro imigambi y’iterambere. Iki cegeranyo c’ibanki y’isi yose ku mwimbu rusangi mu gihugu (Produit National Brut, PIB) ku muntu mu 2021, cerekana ko Uburundi buza mu kibanza ca 195 kuri 196 aho Umurundi umwe aronka USD 240 gusa ku mwaka wose. Ndikumana avuga ko bapima ibi bisunze “umwimbu wimburwa mu gihugu kanaka kuko niwo uba werekana ubutunzi igihugu kiba gifise, hanyuma bagaca baraba abanyagihugu ingene bangana, umwimbu cimbura mu bisata bitandukanye ugaca ugabanganywa ku banyagihugu bakibamwo, baca baraba rero ico umunyegihugu umwe umwe wese yoba aronka”. “Ni nk’uko wofata urugo kanaka rurimwo umugore n’umugabo n’abana icenda nk’akarorero, ugaharura ivyo bimbura ku kwezi, amahera baronka ku kwezi, ugaca uyagabura rero na cumi na rimwe, ari ho rero uca ubona amahera umuntu umwe umwe muri urwo rugo ashobora kuronka ku kwezi”. “Urumva n’ingo zirasumbana, hariho ingo zimbura vyinshi. Amahera yinjira ari menshi. Uko muza kuyagabura muri bake, niko ukubaho neza guca kwiyongera. Iyo muyagabura muri benshi nayo ari make, ubukene buca bwiyongera”. Ku ruhande rw’Uburundi, Faustin Ndikumana abona ko Uburundi bwimbura bike ariko bugategerezwa kugaburira abantu benshi, bigatuma bwama buboneka ko bukenye. Uburundi ni igihugu kibeshejweho ahanini n’uburimyi, ibiharuro bikerekana ko 90% ari bo babeshejweho n’isuka. Icegeranyo c’ikigo ISTEEBU kijejwe kwegeranya ibiharuro giherutse gusohora icegeranyo co mu mwaka wa 2019-2020 cerekana ko abarundi 40% bashobora kumara umusi wose badafunguye. Ibi biri uku mu gihe abarongoye igihugu bavuga ko umwimbu ari wose. Mu gihe yariko ashikiriza abashingamateka n’abakenguzamateka ivyaranguwe n’ubushikiranganji butandukanye mu gice ca kabiri c’umwaka uheze hari mu kw’icumi kw’umwaka uheze nyene ari nawo iki cegeranyo cerekeye,  umushikiranganji wa mbere Alain-Guillaume Bunyoni  yavuze ko muri ico gihe honyene igihugu cari gifise amatoni menshi y’umusesekara ku mwibu w’ibigori. Ndikumana abona ko reta n’abakora ivyegeranyo nk’ibi badahuza kubera reta yoyo ikunda gukoresha imvugo ya poritike. Ati: “Wewe uri mu mabanga, bavuze uko ibintu bimeze birashobora kutakunezera kuko bica vyerekana ko umengo utariko uratunganya ibintu neza. “Imvugo ya poritike sico kimwe n’iy’abahinga, ni naco gituma turiko turasubirira n’inyuma, umunyeporitike wewe yivugira poritike aho kuraba ivyo abahinga bavuga”. Mu gusigura ingorane Uburundi bufise zituma bwama buri inyuma mu butunzi, Faustin Ndikumana afatira ku gitabo ishirahamwe ryiwe riherutse gusohora, aho ryihweza imyaka 60 Uburundi bumaze bwikukiye, n’imyaka ibiri y’ubutegetsi bwa Evariste Ndayishimiye. Muri iki gitabo, yerekana ko imigambi itegurwa ariko ko, iyo hageze kuyishira mu ngiro, “umengo hariko hakorwa ibihushane n’ivyategerezwa kuba biriko birakorwa kugira dushikire intumbero y’iterambere”. Asigura bimwe muri ibi bihushane biri muri iki gitabo, ica mbere ciyongera ku giturire avuga ko “tugomba guterimbere mu gihe tuvuga ko Uburundi bwikwiye kandi ivyegeranyo vyerekana ko ari ubwanyuma k’isi mu bihugu bitunze”. Ati: “Uwuja gukira indwara arayirata, none wewe nimba urwaye indwara, ntiwemere ko uyirwaye, wumva uzoyikira gute? Banza wemere ko ukenye”. Imvo ya kabiri ashikiriza abona ko igihugu kigomba  gutera imbere mu gihe atanzira irashe yo kugiteza imbere ihari ifatiye ku citegererezo c'uko ahandi bigenda. Ati: “Turagenda tukandika ibitabo, ngo plan national de developpement, tukandika, tugakora amanama, ngo dushaka gufata intumbero mugabo izo recommendations tugaca tubika. “Gushika ubu nta kintu na kimwe ca programme-vision usanga reta iriko irakorerako”. Ariko rero, hano ntabona ibintu kumwe na reta ufatiye ku vyo umushikiranganji wa mbere Bunyoni yabwiye abashingamateka n’abakenguzamateka mu kw’icumi kw’umwaka uheze, ari nawo urabwa n’uru rutonde rw’Ibanki y’isi yose, aho yemeza ko integuro ya reta y’igice ca kabiri yakozwe neza mbere hisunzwe uburyo buvuye hagati mu gihugu, akavuga ko ari na ko vyagenze mu gice ca mbere. Yavuze kandi ko n’ibikorwa bishika 290 vyaranguwe neza hisunzwe integuro ya reta kandi ku rugero rwa 79% ku bushikiranganji bwayiranguye ku rugero ruto, be no kuri 97% ku bushikiranganji bwavyitwayemwo neza gusumba ubundi.  Yemeza ko muri rusangi imigambi reta yari ifise yashizwe mu ngiro ku rugero rwa 88%, mu gihe mu gice ca mbere yaranguwe ku rugero rwa 81%. Hagati aho, umushikiranganji wa mbere Bunyoni yaremeje ko ubutunzi bw’igihugu muri ico gice bwagabanutse kubera ikiza karanda ca Covid-19, mbere ko hari n’ibindi bikorwa vyari bitegekanijwe bitashoboye kuranguka. Imvo ya gatatu atanga, avuga ko Uburundi budashobora gutera imbere mu gihe gutanga akazi hatisungwa ubushobozi n’ubumenyi. Ati: “Wewe uvuga ko ushaka gutera imbere gute udashira imbere incabwenge, abashoboye akazi, ubushakashatsi ngo ubushire imbere, mu nzego nyinshi ugasanga abantu bariko bahabwa amabanga badakurikiza ubushobozi, mu gihe ubu ata n’ibigo vy’ubushakashatsi bihari...none wotera imbere gute”? Ikindi gihushane yerekana, ni uko igihugu kigomba gutera imbere “mu gihe ata buryo buhari bwo kuzana amafaranga mvamakungu mu gihugu kugira afashe mukuzibira ikinogo c’amafaranga Uburundi budafise kandi yongere afashe mw’iboneka ry’amafaranga y’agaciro”. Ati: “Mbega iryo terambere uzorironka gute? Uzokoresha amarundi? N’aho worara urayafyatura, ukayarwiza muri BRB ntaco azokumarira”. PARCEM ibona ko amasoko yashobora gutuma igihugu kironka aya mafaranga asa n’ayadakora neza. Ati: “... raba n’ikawa yasubiye inyuma, icayi casubiye inyuma, igisata c’ubukerarungendo ntitugiteza imbere kugira ngo bazane amadevises, raba n’amafaranga y’agaciro yovuye mu nzahabu n’ubutare urabona ko vyanse ...none ushaka gutera imbere gute?” “Nta barwizatunga bazana imitahe mu gihugu; kwaka ingurane ntibikunda kuko usanga badashobora kwizera inzego, badashobora kuzizera ku buryo boziha ingurane y’amafaranga aboneka”. Ikindi gihushane PARCEM ibona gihagaze kw’ikoreshwa ry’amafaranga ya reta ibona ko harimwo igipfungu. Ati: “Wewe woza gutera imbere gute mu gihe n’ingene reta ikoresha amafaranga ata muco urimwo, umengo amafaranga akoreshwa mu kanywababo, amafaranga adakurikiza imigambi y’iterambere izwi, amafaranga atwarirwa mu gifuri, za cour des comptes zitayakontorora?”. Mu mwaka uheze wa 2021, Prezida Ndayishimiye yumvikanye anegura bikomeye abo mu nzego zitandukanye n'abamufasha imirimo y'igihugu abagiriza  kuba aribo batuma ibintu bitagenda neza mu gihugu. Ni mu gihe yaheruka “kuririra imbere” y’abacamanza kw'izina ry'abenegihugu, aho yavuga ko batakironka ubutungane bubereye kubera abo bacamanza bamunzwe n'ibiturire. Umukuru w’iri shirahamwe rihamagarira abantu guhindura ingendo abona ko umukuru w'igihugu afise utwigoro kandi ko n’amajambo ashikiriza atanga icizere, ariko ko abari musi yiwe batamufasha.

column2: Mu kwahukana, Kanye West yategetswe guha Kim Kardashian ibirezo vya 200.000$ ku kwezi
column3: Kanye West yategetswe guha Kim Kardashian ibihumbi 200 vy’amadorari y’Abanyamerika ku kwezi nk’ibirezo vy’abana mu masezerano yo kwahukana. Uyu muraperi rurangiranwa hamwe n’icamamare ku mboneshakure bazosangira kurera abana babo bane. Kardashian yuguruje urubanza rwo kwahukana mu 2021 inyuma y’imyaka umunani abana na West yahavuye ahindura izina akitwa Ye. Ibi bibaye inyuma y’aho amakompanyi atari make ahagarikiye gukorana na Ye kubera ukutumvikana ku bintu bitari bike harimwo amajambo y’urwanko ku Bayahudi. Mu kwa gatatu batangarijwe ko batakari kumwe , mbere na Kardashian ariyambura izina “West” mu mazina yiwe. Ivyo kugabura amatungo be no kurera abana navyo nyene vyaratorewe umuti muri sentare nk’uko biri mu mpapuro za sentare zashizwe ahabona ku wa kabiri. Impande zompi zizoza ziravugana ku ngingo zikomeye ku vyerekeye imibereho y’abana babo, nk’uko izo mpapuro zibivuga. Amafaranga azokoreshwa ku vyerekeye umutekano n’amashure vy’abana bazoyariha bompi. Vyongeye, Ye yiteze kuriha 200.000$ ku kwezi nk’ibirezo vy’abana – kubera, nk’uko ikinyamakuru New York Post kivyandika, abana bazomara igihe kinini kwa Kardashian. Bafitaniye abana bane: North w’imyaka 9, Saint 6, Chicago 4, na Psalm 3. Mu nzandiko zitari nke yasohoye imbere y’aha, Kardashian w’imyaka 42 yavuga ko yipfuza cane ko bahukana, akongerako ko ibi “bizofasha Kanye kwemera” ko uyu mubano warangiye. Imbere y’aha, Ye w’imyaka 45 yararwanije uyu mugambi wo kwahukana. Muri ano mezi ya vuba, yarateje impari, mbere n’amakompanyi atari make aramukurako icizere, harimwo Adidas, Gap, na Balenciaga. Uyu muraperi yaraneguwe bikomeye mu ntango z’uno mwaka inyuma y’aho yitabiriye indwi yahariwe umuderi, Semaine de la mode de Paris, yambaye agapira kanditseko icivugo ngo "White Lives Matter" – amajambo akoreshwa n’abazungu babona ko ari bo basumba abandi (White Supremacy). Mu nyuma yavuze ko abamunegura bahabwa amafaranga n’akarwi k’Abayahudi gakorera mu kinyegero, amajambo asanzwe akorehwa mu kurwanya abayahudi. Mu ntango z’ino ndwi, Ye yatangaje imigambi yiwe yo kwitoreza ikibanza c’umukuru w’igihugu wa Reta Zunze Ubumwe za Amerika mu 2024. Yaheruka kwiyamamaza mu 2020, ariko yaronse amajwi 70.000 gusa.

column2: USA: Prezida Donald Trump na NFL ntibumvikana mu kwiyamiriza ivanguramoko
column3: Ishirahamwe ry'umupira w'amaguru wa Amerika, National Football League, NFL,  rivuga ko abakinyi bakwiye guhabwa uburenganzira bwo kwerekana akababaro kabo mu gihe c'ururirimbo rw'igihugu, ni mu gihe imyiyerekano yo kwiyamiriza ivanguramoko ibandanya. Roger Goodell arongoye iryo shirahamwe, avuga ati: "Kumbe twarihenze kubona twararwanije abakinyi ba NFL ntitunahimirize abantu kwiyamiriza ivanguramoko". Imbere y'aha, iryo shirahamwe NFL ryarihanije abakinyi gusubira gupfukama mu gihe ururirimbo rw'igihugu ruriko rurasamirana, umugirwa wari watangujwe n'umukinyi Colin Kaepernick mu 2016. Uno munsi ku wa gatandatu, hitezwe imyiyerekano rukokoma mu gisagara ca Washington DC. Iyo myiyerekano iri mu rukurikirane rw'iyindi imaze iminsi mu gihugu cose yo kwiyamiriza igikenye n'amacakubiri vy'igipolisi, inyuma y'urupfu rwa George Floyd mu gisagara ca Minneapolis ku wa 25 z'ukwa gatanu guheze. Floyd, umwirabure yari yatewe amapingu, ata kirwanisho anafise, yarapfuye bivuye ku mupolisi yamusinzikarije ubuzima, aho yamupfukamye kw'izosi mu kiringo c'iminota hafi icenda. Uyo mupolisi yaragirijwe ubwicanyi mu gihe abandi bagenziwe batatu bagirijwe kumufasha icaha no gukokeza. Ejo ku wa gatanu, abategetsi ba Minneapolis bamenyesheje ko igipolisi kigiye kwihanizwa gusubira gufata umuntu mu kanigo, eka n'intara ya California nayo nyene ivuga ko igiye gufata iyo ngingo. Mw'ireresi yasohoye, Bwana Goodell yariyamirije ivanguramoko muri Amerika, inyuma y'aho abakinyi batari bake basabiye ishirahamwe NFL gufata ingingo ruhasha zo kwiyamiriza amacakubiri n'igikenye c'igipolisi mu gihugu. Ati: "Twebwe, Ishirahamwe ry'Umupira w'Amaguru, turemera ko ubuzima bw'umwirabure butegerezwa kwuhabihirwa. "Imyiyerekano iri mu gihugu yerekana imyaka ibinjana abakinyi, abafasha, abakunzi hamwe n'abakozi b'abirabure bamaze bahohoterwa kandi barenganywa kakaba akamizwe n'ingoma". "Ngiye kwama mbonana n'abakinyi biyamirije iyo ngendo hamwe n'abandi kugira ngo turabe ingene ibintu vyogenda neza". Perezida Donald Trump wewe siko avyumva, aho yiyamiriza bikomeye umugenzo wo gupfukama mu gihe ururirimbo rw'igihugu ruriko ruraririmbwa, mbere n'ejo ku wa gatanu akaba yarasubiye kwiyamiriza imyiyerekano nk'iyo. Aciye ku rubuga rwa Twitter, yanditse ati: "Ni ngombwa ko duhagarara neza kandi tukagororoka, bibaye ngombwa tukaramutsa canke tukifata ku mutima.  Hariho ivyo dushobora kwiyamiriza, ariko atari ibendera rikomeye rya Amerika". Yarananeguye n'umufasha w'umurwi New Orleans Saints mu vyo ubuhinga, Drew Brees, yirengagije akamo kiwe ko kubuza ivyo gupfukama mu gihe ururirimbo rw'igihugu ruriko rurasamirana. Uyu nawe ntiyavyihanganiye, aho yamwishuye ati: "Ni tureke kuba tuvuga ivy'ibendera twiyibagiza ibibazo nyavyo vy'akarenganyo n'ihohotera bishingiye ku rukoba, ubugome bw'igipolisi hamwe no gutunganya gushasha ibijanye n'ubutungane be n'amabohero". Ejo ku wa gatanu, ubutegetsi bwa Minneapolis hamwe n'igisata kijejwe kwubahiriza agateka ka muntu mu ntara ya Minnesota, barumvikanye kwihaniza igipolisi gusubira gufata mu kanigo abantu". Iyo ngingo nshasha, itegeka umupolisi uwo ari we wese, ata kuraba ipete afise, gutabariza mbere no gutabara, mu gihe azoba abonye mugenziwe asubiriye gukora ikintu nk'ico. Nayo umu democrate Gavin Newsom, buramatari  w'intara ya California, avuga ko agiye kubuza imyimenyerezo y'igipolisi yo gufata umuntu mu kanigo. Ibintu ntivyoroshe rero muri Amerika inyuma y'urupfu rw'umwirabure George Floyd rwatumye igihugu cose kirangwamwo imyiyerekano. Umucamanza w'igihugu mu gisagara ca Denver yategetse igipolisi kudasubira gutera abari mu myiyerekano vya vyuka bikoroza amosozi, amasasu ya plastiki eka n'ibindi birwanisho bitica ariko bibabaza. Iryo tegeko ryaje inyuma y'aho bane mu bari muri iyo myiyerekano bitwariye igipolisi ku gukoresha igikenye.

column2: Ayavugwa mw’igura n’igurishwa ry’abakinyi: Lewandowski, Lingard, De Ligt, Firmino, Kimpembe
column3: Umukinyi w’inyuma wa PSG umufaransa Presnel Kimpembe w’imyaka 26 aracaronderwa na Chelsea mu gihe uyo murwi wo mw’ihiganwa ry’Ubufaransa Ligue 1 uri kw’isoko urondera uwundi mukinyi w’inyuma. (Goal) Chelsea iriko iratera intambwe mu biganiro vyo kurondera Matthijs de Ligt w’imyaka 22, ariko Juventus ishaka ko bafatira ku ngingo ivuga ko uwukeneye uyu munya-Hollande ategerezwa kuriha imiriyoni 102 z’amapawundi. (Telegraph) Juventus iripfuza umusatirizi w’umudagi Timo Werner Chelsea ishaka gutanga mu masezerano yo kurondera De Ligt ariko iyi mirwi yompi ntirumvikana ku kurwanira uyu munya-Brezili w’imyaka 25. (Times) Manchester City ishobora kugurisha umukinyi w’inyuma wayo Nathan Ake w’imyaka 27 mu gihe honyene hoboneka uwushobora kumusubirira, ni mu gihe uyu munya-Hollande avugwa ko ashobora gusubira muri Chelsea yahoze akinira. (Manchester Evening News) Tottenham iri mu biganiro bigeze kure kugira irabe ko yogura umwongereza akina inyuma ku ruhande rw’i buryo Djed Spence w’imyaka 21 asanzwe akinira Middlesbrough,  ku giciro c’imiriyoni 15 z’amapawundi yongere itange n’uturusho. (Sky Sports) Juventus irashaka amasezerano yo kuguza umukinyi wayo wo hagati umufaransa Adrien Rabiot w’imyaka 27 n’umusatirizi wa Liverpool umunya-Brezili Roberto Firmino w’imyaka 30. (Calciomercato – mu gitaliyano) Umusatirizi wa Espagne Alvaro Morata avugwa ko aronderwa na Arsenal, agiye gusubira muri Atletico Madrid inyuma y’aho Juventus ifatiye ingingo yo kutagumana burundu uyu mukinyi w’imyaka 29 inyuma y’umwaka yari amaze akina muri uyu murwi w’ihiganwa ry’Ubutaliyano Serie A yari yaratijijwemwo. (Goal) Arsenal yatanze igifovya c’amafaranga angana n’imiriyoni 38 z’amapawundi kugira irabe ko yoronka umukinyi w’inyuma w’umunya-Argentina Lisandro Martinez w’imyaka 24 ariko umurwi wiwe Ajax wabateye akagere. Uyu murwi wo muri Hollande umushakako imiriyoni 43 z’amapawundi, Manchester United ikaba ishobora guca yongereza umurindi kugira ngo irabe ko yoshobora kumutahukana mu mpera z’iyi ndwi. (Mail) West Ham yongereje inguvu mu rugamba rwo kurondera umwongereza Jesse Lingard w’imyaka 29 ataco irinze gutanga, ariko ishobora kubanza gusaba uyu musatirizi yahoze akinira Manchester United kubanza kwemera kugabanya umushahara asaba. (Guardian) Wolves yatsinze urugamba yarimwo irondera kugumana umukinyi wo hagati wa Portugal Ruben Neves w’imyaka 25, mu gihe imirwi yahora imurondera yagumanye amadidane ku giciro gisabwa c’imiriyoni 75 z’amapawundi. (Sun) Umukinyi wo hagati wa Leeds United umwongereza Kalvin Phillips w’imyaka 26, yitezwe gufatwa ibipimo vyo kwa muganga muri Manchester City kuri uyu wa gatanu imbere y’uko yimukira muri uyu murwi watahukanye ihiganwa rya Premier League ku miriyoni 45 z’amapawundi. (Sky Sports) mu gifaransa) Umunyegori wa Argentina Sergio Romero w’imyaka 35 aripfuza gusubira muri Manchester United – haciye umwaka umwe gusa ayivuyemwo akimukira muri Venezia yo muri Serie A mu Butaliyano. column2: Pablo Escobar: hatowe amafaranga menshi yanyegejwe mu nzu y'uyu yahoze acuruza ibiyayuramutwe
column3: Umuhungwabo w'uwahoze ari rurangiranwa mu rucuruza rw'ibiyayuramutwe Pablo Escobar avuga ko yatoye isashe yuzuye amafaranga angana na miliyoni 18 z'amadolari yari anyegeje mu ruhome rw'imwe mu nzu za se wabo. Nicolás Escobar yabwiye ikinyamakuru co muri Colombia aho bashobora gusanga aya mafaranga mu nzu asanzwe abamwo mu gisagara ca Medellín. Avuga ko atari bwo bwa mbere atoye amafaranga mu bibanza se wabo atashaka kubonamwo umuntu, ni mu gihe uyu Escobar avugwa ko yasize anyegeje amamiliyoni menshi mu mazu yiwe. Yapfuye mu mwaka wa 1993 arashwe n'abapolisi. Igihe yagera kw'isonga ry'umwuga wiwe, Escobar yaramenyekanye ko yari umuntu agira indwi atunze kw'isi yose. Kuva apfuye, hagumye hari ibihuha i Medellín  ko Escobar yanyegeje amatungo yiwe, inyuma y'imyaka iharurwa muri mirongo arwana na leta ya Colombia yashaka kumurungika muri Leta Zunze Ubumwe za Amerika zariko ziramuhiga. Nicolás Escobar yabwiye televiziyo yo muri Colombia Red+ Noticias ko yatoye kandi n'imashini yo kwandika, amatelefone yakorana naza satellite, ikaramu y'inzahabu, kamera hamwe na firime y'amafoto atari bwogeshwe. Ati: "Igihe cose naricara mu cumba co gufungura, nkaraba muri parikingi y'imodoka, nama mbona umugabo yinjira muri ico kibanza agaca agenda". "Umunuko wari muri ico kibanza wari uteye ubwoba. Umunuko wasumvya incuro ijana uwuva mu kintu capfuye". Nicolás Escobar, yari asanzwe aba muri iyo nzu mu myaka itanu iheze, avuga ko amwe mu manoti amaze imyaka mirongo yari yaboze ku buryo atokoreshwa. Mu kiganiro, avuga ko kenshi yama aherekeza se wabo, kandi ko igihe kimwe yigeze kunyuruzwa n'abantu bariko barondera aho Escobar yari yinyegeje. Ati: " Naraborejwe igufa mu kiringo c'amasaha indwi yose. Bamwe mu bakozi banje bakubiswe umusumenu". Escobar yavukiye ahitwa Rionegro muri Colombia mu 1949, akaba yatanguje akarwi kacuruza ibiyayuramutwe mu gisagara ca Medellín mu myaka ya 1970. Mu myaka uru rudandazwa rwari rukomeye cane, aka karwi niko kinjije mu buryo bwa magendo hafi ibice 80% vy'urumogi rwinjijwe muri Amerika. Ubutunzi bwiwe bwamutumye ashirwa ku rutonde rwa Forbes (ikinyamakuru gitangaza amakuru y'ubutunzi) rw'abatunzi ba mbere w'isi mu kiringo c'imyaka indwi yose. Igihe Amerika isohoreye umutahe wo kumurondera, Escobar yararwanye intambara kugira ntashobore gufatwa, aho akarwi kiwe kakoze ibitero ku banyapolitike, abapolisi n'abamenyeshamakuru. Amaze gufatwa mu 1991, Escobar yapfungiwe mw'ibohero yubatswe ku ntumbero we nyene yatanze, yari yataziriwe Katederari (Cathedral), ayo yabandanije agenzura urudandaza rwiwe i Medellín. Muri rusangi, Escobar aharurwako abantu bagera ku 4000 bishwe. Ariko rero, amamuko yiwe y'umuntu yicisha bugufi yatumye amenyekana mu Banyakolombiya batari bake bari bamushigikiye kubera amafaranga menshi yabaha, mbere akaba yarafashije uturere dukenye mu gisagara ca Medellín.

column2: Yegereyegere "Kwa Siyoni": Abajejwe iryo soko ntibavuga rumwe n'abarikoreramwo
column3: Abadandariza mw'isoko rya Bujumbura City Market rizwi nko kwa Siyoni barahagaritse ibikorwa vyabo kuva kuri uyu wa kabiri biyamiriza iduzwa ry'amahera yo kuriha ibibanza bakoreramwo  gushika ku ncuro zibiri. Ariko abajejwe iryo soko, bavuga yuko ukwo kuduza ibiciro kwari gukenewe uravye ibihe tugezemwo n'uburyo bwakoreshejwe mu kuvugurura isoko. Umupfasoni umwe muri abo badandaza bavuganye na BBC atashimye kwivuga izina, avuga ko bandikiwe amakete abamenyesha ko kuva itariki 10 z'ukwezi kwa mbere 2022 amahera bahora bariha yadugijwe incuro zibiri. Agira ati: "Batumenyesheje ko kubera ibikorwa vyakozwe muri iryo soko, ko kuva mu kwezi kwa mbere amahera twahora turiha azohinduka. Akarorero abahora bariha ibihumbi 400 ku kwezi bazoriha ibihumbi 750, abahora bariha na bo 188.800 bakazoriha 312.000. Urumva ko bagwijije incuro zibiri zirenga." Ivyo bikorwa bivugwa vyakozwe ngo ni nko kwubaka ahahagarara imiduga, gusiga isima hasi hamwe n'amabombo (robine) azana amazi mu ntumbero yo kwikingira ikiza Covid-19. Abadandariza muri  iyo soko bavuga ko batanka ko ibiciro vyoduga, ariko bagasaba ko habanza kuba inama n'ingingo. BBC yashoboye kuvugana n'uburongozi bw'iryo soko, uwitwa Joseph Dukundane atubwira yuko baravye igihe cari kihaciye amahera ataduzwa kandi ibintu vyarazimvye, hamwe n'ibikorwa vyo kuvugurura isoko baranguye, ngo ukwo kuduza ibiciro kwari gukenewe: Kanda ngaha wumve ico kiganiro.
